<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perpetual Scout](/Feats.aspx?ID=1990) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Horizon Walker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=63)

**Prerequisites**
[Horizon Walker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1987)

</column>

---

You spot anything out of place in the areas you know best. While in your favored terrain, you always gain the benefits of the [Scout](/Actions.aspx?ID=518) exploration activity, even if you are performing another exploration activity. If you're legendary in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16), you gain these benefits in any terrain.
